decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with cheap spells and efficiently bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard to deal consistent damage to the opponent. The deck relies on a combination of card draw, counter spells, and removal to control the game while building up to bring back multiple Arclight Phoenixes in a single turn for a powerful attack. The inclusion of Temporal Trespass allows for a potential game-winning extra turn, while Prismari Command and Brazen Borrower provide additional utility and flexibility in different game situations.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using Spirit creatures to build up a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing cards like Ascendant Spirit, Supreme Phantom, and Curious Obsession, the deck aims to quickly accrue damage and pressure the opponent. With a mix of control elements like Spell Pierce and Geistlight Snare, the deck can disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a steady stream of threats. By leveraging the synergy of Spirit creatures and evasion abilities, the deck aims to close out games swiftly and decisively.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of life gain through creatures like Wildgrowth Walker and Amalia Benavides Aguirre to trigger Aetherflux Reservoir for a game-winning combo. The deck also includes a toolbox of creatures to search for with Collected Company and Chord of Calling, providing flexibility and resilience. By efficiently gaining life and assembling the combo pieces, the deck can quickly reach a critical mass of life and blast opponents with Aetherflux Reservoir for lethal damage.

This deck focuses on quickly turning artifacts into powerful creatures and using them to deal fast and consistent damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Ensoul Artifact and Shrapnel Blast, along with strong artifact creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Smuggler's Copter, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and efficient removal. Additionally, the inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional flexibility and consistency to the deck's strategy. With a mix of artifact synergy and aggressive creatures, this deck seeks to dominate the battlefield early and maintain pressure throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to consistently bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard by casting instants and sorceries spells and using cards like Consider and Treasure Cruise to fill up the graveyard. The deck also includes early game removal spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe to control the board. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with flying threats and out value them with card draw through spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand. Additionally, the inclusion of Picklock Prankster and Ledger Shredder helps disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana quickly in order to cast powerful spells and combo off. It includes cards that can help find Lotus Field, untap it, and protect it, as well as win conditions such as Omniscience and Emergent Ultimatum. The deck aims to set up a board state where it can cast multiple spells in a single turn and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful combo potential.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays, with cards like Bloodtithe Harvester and Vein Ripper to apply pressure early on. The deck utilizes disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the opponent's board while continuing its aggressive strategy. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord allows for powerful creature boosts and recursion, while Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provides card advantage. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and disruption, backed up by a strong mana base and a versatile sideboard for different matchups.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying a wide board of aggressive creatures to overwhelm the opponent. By leveraging low-cost creatures like Novice Inspector and Ornithopter, the deck aims to build up a strong battlefield presence early on. Key cards like Venerated Loxodon and Warden of the Inner Sky help boost the power of the team, while cards like Reckless Bushwhacker provide a powerful finisher. The deck also includes removal spells like Gleeful Demolition to clear the way for attacks. Overall, the deck aims to establish dominance on the battlefield and push for a quick victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Discover mechanic to find and play powerful combo pieces such as Quintorius Kand, Spinewoods Armadillo, and Trumpeting Carnosaur. It also includes cards like Clever Impersonator and Spark Double to duplicate key creatures and Boseiju, Who Endures to protect important spells. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements while Leyline Binding helps control the opponent's board. The inclusion of a Companion in the form of Keruga, the Macrosage provides additional card advantage and consistency to the deck.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive play with cards like Bloodtithe Harvester and Vein Ripper to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the game and maintain pressure. Utilizing powerful creatures like Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory. The mana base is set up to support the deck's aggressive strategy, allowing for quick and efficient plays to stay ahead in the game.
